DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Sample Normal Control Collection Month Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the month on which the normal tissue specimen was obtained.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A piece of tissue removed from an organism for examination, analysis, or propagation._Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm. (NCI)_The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another._The act of gathering something together.

Concepts.definition: A piece of tissue removed from an organism for examination, analysis, or propagation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm. (NCI):The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another.:The act of gathering something together.

Concepts.definition: Being approximately average or within certain limits; conforming with or constituting a norm or standard or level or type or social norm.
The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released per approval by T.Lichtenberg. mc 10/5/11 Versioned to change OC from Tumor Tissue to Tissue Sample per request by Tara. mc 12/30/15

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: One of ten equal parts; a quantity corresponding to one tenth of the whole.: A list or register of events; a tabular array of the days.: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Concepts.definition: One of ten equal parts; a quantity corresponding to one tenth of the whole.
A list or register of events; a tabular array of the days.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
